content.text: Hey, I'm new in town. What's good to do around here?
There's a lot of great stuff to do in Seattle! You can check out the Space Needle, Pike Place Market, or the Museum of Pop Culture.
I've heard good things about Pike Place Market. What's it like?
It's a great place to get fresh produce, seafood, and flowers. There's also a lot of street performers and musicians.
That sounds fun! I'll definitely check it out.
There's also a lot of great restaurants in Seattle. What kind of food do you like?
There's a great Italian restaurant called The Pink Door. They have amazing eggplant parmigiana.
That sounds delicious! I'll have to check it out.
You can also find some great Italian food at Il Bistro. It's a little more expensive, but it's worth it.
Thanks for the suggestions! I'm excited to try some of these places.
No problem! I hope you enjoy Seattle.
